articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European stocks rise following U.S.-China deal to cut tariffs; Maersk jumps 13% - CNBC
articles.description: European markets have started the new trading week on a positive note following the White House's announcement that it had reached a deal on tariffs with China.
articles.content: The CEO of UniCredit told CNBC on Monday that the bank was still weighing its options regarding takeover bids for fellow Italian lender Banco BPM and Germany's Commerzbank, but would not be swayed by… [+1524 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Zelenskyy challenges Putin to meet him in Turkey 'personally' for ceasefire talks - NPR
articles.description: Ukraine and European allies had demanded Russia accept a 30-day ceasefire starting Monday before holding talks, but Moscow effectively rejected the proposal and called for direct negotiations instead.
articles.content: KYIV, Ukraine Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Sunday challenged Russia's President Vladimir Putin to meet him personally in Turkey on Thursday, the latest move in a weekend-long exchange o… [+6838 chars]
